aspects.name: Relational Strengths
aspects.value: Takes charge. Problem solver. Competitive. Enjoys change. Confrontational.

aspects.name: Strengths Out of Balance
aspects.value: Too direct or impatient. Too busy. Cold blooded. Impulsive or takes big risks. Insensitive to others

aspects.name: Communication Style
aspects.value: Direct or blunt. One-way. Weakness: Not as good a listener.

aspects.name: Relational Needs
aspects.value: Personal attention & recognition for what they do. Areas where he or she can be in charge. Opportunity to solve problems. Freedom to change. Challenging activities.

aspects.name: Relational Balance
aspects.value: Add softness. Become a great listener

aspects.name: Relational Strengths
aspects.value: Optimistic. Energetic. Motivators. Future oriented.

aspects.name: Strengths Out of Balance
aspects.value: Unrealistic or day-dreamer. Impatient or over bearing. Manipulator or pushy. Avoids details or lacks follow-through.

aspects.name: Communication Style
aspects.value: Can inspire others. Optimistic or enthusiastic. One-way. Weakness: High energy can manipulate others.

aspects.name: Relational Needs
aspects.value: Approval. Opportunity to verbalize. Visibility. Social recognition.

aspects.name: Relational Balance
aspects.value: Be attentive to mate's needs. There is such a thing as too much optimism.

aspects.name: Relational Strengths
aspects.value: Warm & Relational. Loyal. Enjoys Routine. Peace-Maker. Sensitive Feelings.

aspects.name: Strengths Out of Balance
aspects.value: Attract the hurting. Missed opportunities. Stays in a rut. Sacrifice own feelings for harmony. Easily hurt or holds a grudge.

aspects.name: Communication Style
aspects.value: Indirect. Two-way. Great listener. Weakness: Uses too many words or provides too many details.

aspects.name: Relational Needs
aspects.value: Emotional security. Agreeable Environment.

aspects.name: Relational Balance
aspects.value: Learn to say "NO" â€¦ establish emotional boundaries. Learn to confront when own feelings are hurt.

aspects.name: Relational Strengths
aspects.value: Accurate and precise. Quality control. Discerning. Analytical.

aspects.name: Strengths Out of Balance
aspects.value: Too critical or too strict. Too controlling. Too negative of new opportunities. Lose overview.

aspects.name: Communication Style
aspects.value: Factual. Two-way. Great listener (tasks). Weakness: Desire for detail and precision can frustrate others.

aspects.name: Relational Needs
aspects.value: Quality. Exact expectations

aspects.name: Relational Balance
aspects.value: Total support is not always possible. Thorough explanation isn't everything
